name: VectorWars VR
description: VectorWars is a cool arcade style space shooter with full support for VR and non-VR. Get your ship, upgrade stuff, and give them hell.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Onboard
